text: Bishop Severian Stefan Yakymyshyn, O.S.B.M. (; 22 April 1930 â€“ 6 September 2021) was a Canadian Ukrainian Greek Catholic hierarch. He was an Eparchial Bishop of Ukrainian Catholic Eparchy of New Westminster from 5 January 1995 until his retirement 1 June 2007. He was born in Plain Lake, Alberta, Canada. Yakymyshyn died on 6 September 2021 in Vancouver, British Columbia at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Eastern Catholic bishops Category:People from Alberta Category:People from Vancouver
title: Severian Yakymyshyn
